meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amy Berg Michael Buss Choyon Manjrekar Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7076.

td.p: Amy Berg, a graduate student in philosophy from San Diego, California
Michael Buss, a creative director from Tiburon, California
Choyon Manjrekar, an urban planner from Providence, Rhode Island (whose 2-day cash winnings total $42,700)

tr.td: STATE OF THE UNION HEADQUARTERS
(Alex: You have to identify the state.)
TV-"G"
PORTMANTEAU WORDS
WE'LL ALWAYS HAVE PARROTS
DOSTOYEVSKY
GRIME & PUNISHMENT

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
